name: Charles II of England
what_did:
Charles II became king after years of England having no king.
He brought back the monarchy with more balance and fun.
People called him the 'Merry Monarch' because he loved parties, theater, and music.
why_matters:
Charles helped heal England after a civil war.
He accepted some limits on royal power and worked with Parliament.
He showed that rulers could learn from the past.
